io.github.cvc5.api

Class OptionInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.cvc5.api.OptionInfo

  • public class OptionInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds some description about a particular option, including its name, its aliases, whether the option was explicitly set by the user, and information concerning its value. The `valueInfo` member holds any of the following alternatives: - VoidInfo if the option holds no value (or the value has no native type) - ValueInfo if the option is of type boolean or String, holds the current value and the default value. - NumberInfo if the option is of type BigInteger or double, holds the current and default value, as well as the minimum and maximum. - ModeInfo if the option is a mode option, holds the current and default values, as well as a list of valid modes. Additionally, this class provides convenience functions to obtain the current value of an option in a type-safe manner using boolValue(), stringValue(), intValue(), and doubleValue(). They assert that the option has the respective type and return the current value.

    • Nested Class Summary

      class  OptionInfo.VoidInfo
